publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2585.5 Shiona Baird: Housingâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-2585) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end "and, in light of the recent vote on motion S2M-2462, carried by 76 votes to 1, calling for tougher action on energy efficiency, calls on the Scottish Executive to incorporate into the Housing (Scotland) Bill a commitment to energy efficiency targets for the domestic sector." Supported by: Patrick Harvie* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
